name: Youda Farmer 2: Save the Village
summary: Stop the Big Boss and save the village! After destroying almost everything on the farm, the Big Boss is out to execute his evil plans! Earn and invest your money wisely to stop this evil maniac from building more hideous parking garages on your beautiful land. Rebuild the farm, collect wood and stone, and grow fantastic crops in Youda Farmer 2: save the village, a fun time management game.
